content.text: Ascribe to the  Glory
A Psalm of David.
Ascribe to the , O heavenly beings,
ascribe to the  glory and strength.
Ascribe to the  the glory due his name;
worship the  in the splendor of holiness.
The voice of the  is over the waters;
the God of glory thunders,
the , over many waters.
The voice of the  is powerful;
the voice of the  is full of majesty.
The voice of the  breaks the cedars;
the  breaks the cedars of Lebanon.
He makes Lebanon to skip like a calf,
and Sirion like a young wild ox.
The voice of the  flashes forth flames of fire.
The voice of the  shakes the wilderness;
the  shakes the wilderness of Kadesh.
The voice of the  makes the deer give birth
and strips the forests bare,
and in his temple all cry, “Glory!”
The  sits enthroned over the flood;
the  sits enthroned as king forever.
May the  give strength to his people!
May the  bless his people with peace!
